title: anurag54321
author: anurag54321
content: Hello,I am building a crypto market sentiment website. However, I have always struggled to attract visitors. Can someone please tell me how to get a lot of visitors without spending a lot of money or for free.Regards

comments.author: masterrex
comments.body: I think free is not the right word, but spending a decent amount can be a game-changer because as we all know many sites are already operating with the same function that's why the competition is very tight so it needs a marketing exposure to gain some audience, but it is not free nowadays it needs money to make it happen, even the top caliber sites are using a calibrated marketing strategy to gain some users and visitors in the site.

Can someone please tell me how to get a lot of visitors without spending a lot of money or for free.RegardsConsider deploying the website on top of the internet computer. You will attract blockchain enthusiasts and the entire ICP community.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: You can create your own token. You can announce your website from Twitter accounts with large followers that share airdrops. You can try to create daily quests like collecting diamonds.None of these may work, but it's worth a try. I wish you good luck. :)

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: It's got something to do with SEO there, OP. You're not getting traffic, because even the most basic keywords used by the many is not present in your website. I don't do SEO, but I am fully aware that a website should get traffic if it just contain the right keywords. You should be able to learn SEO for free and without spending anything although it would cost you your time, but that is all up to you.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: If you don't like spending money on ads, you need to actively engage with your potential users and you need to be active on different social media platforms promoting that app of yours manually. That's like organic marketing that you only need to spend your time and effort since you lack a budget. Since you're also in the forum, create a service announcement for that app and then actively share what's inside your app to give us a view of what it looks like and if those sentiments are near accurate.
